Contributor: White, J. M., artist.; Norris Peters Co., lithographer.;
Note: Signed "J.M. White." Date based on America's participation in the war. Orientation: Vertical.
Description: Text says that it's very important to increase the building schedule of destroyers, to prevent the sinking of any ships. Illustration shows a sinking ship.
Digital Collection: Allied Posters of World War I

Title: One destroyer might have prevented this
